page.title: 04ROYAL SPA CENTRE.
page.content: The Royal Spa Centre situated on Newbold Terrace adjacent to the Jephson Gardens was officially opened on June 15th 1972. This Leisure Centre consists of three main rooms: The Avon Room, Newbold Hall and The Jephson Room. The Avon Hall has seating for 799 on two levels.The ground floor seats are removable so that the room may be used for concerts, shows, exhibitions, conferences, dances, sporting events and receptions. The Newbold Hall has 208 fixed seats and is used for lectures, seminars and promotions.Both halls have projection facilities.The centre is used by local groups ranging from the Operatic Society to the Over Sixties group. The Jephson Room is used for committee meetings.
